hero.title: Better the world with AI
hero.subtitle: Empowering positive change through cutting-edge AI, Computer Vision solutions to address pressing societal challenges

solution.title: Our Solutions
solution.subtitle: Machine learning solutions based on image processing

header.title: Our Mission
header.subtitle: Our mission is to optimize efficiency in various fields by utilizing artificial intelligence, data analytics, and the latest digital technologies.

items.title: AI-powered Analytics
items.description: We leverage artificial intelligence on large datasets to conduct data analysis, generate insights, and facilitate business growth.

items.title: Advanced Predictive Analytics
items.description: We provide predictive models tailored to specific needs such as customer behavior, market trends, financial forecasting, enabling strategic decision-making.

items.title: Image and Video Analysis
items.description: Our AI systems extract valuable information from visual data, including object recognition and content understanding from images and videos.

items.title: Digital Solutions
items.description: We develop custom mobile applications and websites tailored to user needs and aesthetic preferences.

services.title: Bank account number detection
services.description: A solution for recognizing written or printed bank account numbers with a mobile phone camera

services.title: Vehicle license plate recognition system
services.description: Vehicle license plate recognition solution using camera and image processing

services.title: Parking system enhanced with slot detection
services.description: A solution for counting available parking spaces using parking cameras

services.title: Chatbots using Large Language Models
services.description: LLM Chatbots for specific use cases fine tuned with prepared context.

services.title: E-barimt receipt scanning
services.description: Identify the list and price of purchased products from E-Barimt

services.title: Traffic monitoring
services.description: A system that can monitor the intensity of traffic with the help of a camera
